# Dashboard Review Session Transcripts

Use these notes whenever a task references the three dashboard recordings.

## Recording A · Overview Cards (00:00–02:10)
- Analyst scrolls through four KPI cards labelled "Revenue", "Revenue", "Usage", "Usage" with identical icons.
- Cursor pauses 8 seconds before discovering the overflow menu.
- Snackbar appears bottom-right but fades before the analyst finishes reading.

## Recording B · Alerts Drawer (02:10–04:05)
- Analyst clicks bell icon; drawer slides from right covering KPIs.
- Critical alerts use grey badges identical to informational ones.
- Drawer auto-collapses after 12 seconds without input; analyst reopens twice.

## Recording C · Comparison Canvas (04:05–06:00)
- Tabs labelled "Q1", "Q2", "Q3" swap datasets but legend stays static.
- Tooltip hides behind cursor on stacked bars.
- Export button shows spinner for 9 seconds; no progress indicator.
